title: Nigel Marples
text:
Nigel Marples (born November 3, 1985) is a Canadian <a href="Association%20Football">football</a> player and coach.
Career.
College.
Marples attended <a href="North%20Delta%20High%20School">North Delta High School</a> and played <a href="college%20soccer">college soccer</a> at <a href="Towson%20University">Towson University</a>, where he was a four-year starter and two year <a href="Captain%20%28association%20football%29">captain</a>. During his college years he also played with the <a href="Abbotsford%20Rangers">Abbotsford Rangers</a> in the <a href="USL%20Premier%20Development%20League">USL Premier Development League</a>.
Professional.
Marples joined the professional ranks after graduation with the <a href="Vancouver%20Whitecaps%20%281986%E2%80%932010%29">Vancouver Whitecaps</a> of <a href="USL%20First%20Division">USL First Division</a>, but only appeared in 2 matches and was released. He then turned to indoor soccer after being drafted by the <a href="Philadelphia%20KiXX">Philadelphia KiXX</a>. He appeared in 27 games before moving back outdoors with <a href="USL%20Second%20Division">USL Second Division</a> <a href="Harrisburg%20City%20Islanders">Harrisburg City Islanders</a>, and then on to the <a href="Charleston%20Battery">Charleston Battery</a> in 2009.
Marples joined <a href="HB%20K%C3%B8ge">HB Køge</a> from the <a href="Danish%201st%20Division">Danish 1st Division</a> on 9 August 2012. He left the club in summer 2013 and returned to <a href="Vancouver">Vancouver</a>.
International.
Marples has also spent time in the Canadian U-20 player pool, but has yet to be capped.
as Coach.
After his return in summer 2013 to Canada, was named as Head coach of the <a href="Roman%20Tulis%20European%20Soccer%20School%20of%20Excellence">Roman Tulis European Soccer School of Excellence</a>. Since October 2013 works besides his coaching career by the Roman Tulis Soccer School, as Player-Coach of the <a href="BC%20Premier%20Soccer%20League">BC Premier Soccer League</a> side Fusion FC in <a href="Richmond%2C%20British%20Columbia">Richmond</a>. Marples studied Masters in Coaching Education over distance learning on the <a href="Ohio%20University">Ohio University</a>. He is currently the Head Soccer Coach at the Principia School (2017).
